about_the_game:
Thank you for choosing DopeNet. The dark web drug dealing sim that 9/10 Moms prefer!

Log in now for a fast-paced digital selling spree! Buy low and sell high, take risks and stack chip - all while avoiding the feds, basement dwelling hackers and butthurt dating app rejects.



How to DopeNet: Your loan is approved! DopeNet loan sharks are human garbage, so be sure to pay off your debt in 30 days or less (WITH INTEREST or it’s your cheeks)!

Start Making Money: Monitor our digital marketplace for product, buy when prices are low, select a new city to trade in and SELL HIGH!

Get Lucky: Check your inbox for opportunities to invest in yourself, such as the DopeNet lottery or Fontucky Derby horse races.

Current Alerts: Hack attempts on DopeNet wallets, law enforcement ramping up raids and seizure of DopeNet product. BlvckShield Security is currently monitoring for all threats.

*DopeNet is not responsible for: injury, death, emotional trauma, police raids, exotic animal attacks, pregnancy or explosive diarrhea.*

content_descriptors.notes: Reference to imaginary, fantasy drug names. Occasional foul language in text.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: DopeNet is a stupidly fun, dark web fantasy drug dealing simulator. Buy low, sell HIGH, go get it.
